summary.headline: 米国市場開始前予測：S&P500上昇期待、テック株が牽引
summary.text: 米国市場開始前の分析では、S&P500は前日比0.5%上昇が期待される。テック株の好調が市場を牽引し、特にAI関連銘柄が注目されている。前日の経済指標も好ましい結果を示しており、投資家心理は楽観的。ただし、利上げ観測については慎重な見方が続いている。

breadth.summary: 上昇銘柄が優勢、市場環境は良好

dashboard.sentimentVISummary: 投資家心理は楽観的、リスク選好度は中程度

sectors.technology: テック株は前日比1.2%上昇期待
sectors.finance: 金融株は横ばい、利上げ観測が影響
sectors.energy: エネルギー株は原油価格上昇で0.8%上昇期待

keyFactors: 利上げ観測の慎重な見方

summary.headline: Pre-Market Prediction: S&P 500 Expected to Rise, Tech Stocks Lead
summary.text: Pre-market analysis suggests the S&P 500 is expected to rise 0.5% from the previous close. Tech stocks are leading the market, with particular focus on AI-related stocks. Yesterday's economic indicators showed favorable results, maintaining optimistic investor sentiment. However, cautious views persist regarding rate hike expectations.

breadth.summary: Advancing stocks dominate, market environment favorable

dashboard.sentimentVISummary: Investor sentiment optimistic, moderate risk appetite

sectors.technology: Tech stocks expected to rise 1.2% from previous close
sectors.finance: Financial stocks flat, affected by rate hike expectations
sectors.energy: Energy stocks expected to rise 0.8% due to oil price increase

keyFactors: Cautious views on rate hike expectations
